tool_description: https://getguidelines.com -- Free REST API for Medical Guidelines. Use biometric and demographic data to search the same medical references used by healthcare professionals. Get personalized clinical recommendations using parameters such as weight, blood pressure, age, etc.
title: GetGuidelines

api_list.name: all
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://getguidelines.p.rapidapi.comhttps://getguidelines.com/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "getguidelines.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
